item.title: By: judith and matt
item.dc:creator: judith and matt
item.description: <p>It's good to be in Florida, had good time in NY weather is 14c today getting warmer through week. Eiblis & Richard arrive tomorrow, hope you're all well, speak soon.</p>
item.content:encoded: It’s good to be in Florida, had good time in NY weather is 14c today getting warmer through week. Eiblis & Richard arrive tomorrow, hope you’re all well, speak soon.

item.title: By: Jim & mum
item.dc:creator: Jim & mum
item.description: <p>hope it's warmed up for you, i won't say how we got on against the norwich fans, lets just say we lost! weatherr very hot here 8 degrees! look foward to the next update!</p>
item.content:encoded: hope it’s warmed up for you, i won’t say how we got on against the norwich fans, lets just say we lost! weatherr very hot here 8 degrees! look foward to the next update!
